en.name: Xia’s Traditional Chinese Medicine

carouselImages.description: Traditional Chinese Medicine is a type of holistic, natural health care system that dates back at least 2,000 years to the year 200 B.C.

Traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) originated in ancient China and has evolved over thousands of years. TCM practitioners use herbal medicines and various mind and body practices, such as acupuncture and tai chi, to treat or prevent health problems. In the United States and Canada, people use TCM primarily as a complementary health approach.

Acupuncture is a holistic health technique that stems from Traditional Chinese Medicine practices in which trained practitioners stimulate specific points on the body by inserting thin needles into the skin.

A hearing aid or deaf aid is an electroacoustic device which is designed to amplify sound for the wearer, usually with the aim of making speech more intelligible, and to correct impaired hearing as measured by audiometer. In the United States, Hearing aids are considered medical devices and are regulated by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA). Ordinary small audio amplifiers or other plain sound reinforcing systems cannot be sold as “hearing aids”.

en.description: We provide acupuncture, massage, and herbal medicine services.

services.title: Acupuncture
services.description: Relieve pain and improve health through acupuncture.

services.title: Massage
services.description: Traditional massage techniques to relax muscles and improve circulation.

services.title: Herbal Medicine
services.description: Custom herbal prescriptions based on your body condition.

doctors.name: Dr. Zhang
doctors.title: Acupuncture Specialist
doctors.bio: Dr. Zhang has over 20 years of experience in acupuncture and traditional Chinese medicine.
doctors.fullBio: Dr. Zhang is a renowned acupuncture specialist with a focus on pain management and chronic conditions. He graduated from Beijing University of Chinese Medicine and has been practicing for over 20 years.

doctors.name: Dr. Li
doctors.title: Herbal Medicine Expert
doctors.bio: Dr. Li specializes in herbal medicine and has helped thousands of patients improve their health.
doctors.fullBio: Dr. Li is an expert in herbal medicine and holistic health. She holds a Ph.D. in Traditional Chinese Medicine and has published numerous research papers on herbal remedies.

zh.name: 夏草堂
zh.insurance: 我们接受公司保险和汽车保险。

zh.description: 我们提供针灸、推拿和中药服务。

services.title: 针灸
services.description: 通过针灸缓解疼痛，改善健康。

services.title: 推拿
services.description: 传统推拿手法，放松肌肉，改善血液循环。

services.title: 中药
services.description: 根据个人体质，配制中药方剂。

doctors.name: 张医生
doctors.title: 针灸专家
doctors.bio: 张医生拥有 20 多年的针灸和中医经验。
doctors.fullBio: 张医生是著名的针灸专家，专注于疼痛管理和慢性病治疗。他毕业于北京中医药大学，拥有超过 20 年的临床经验。

doctors.name: 李医生
doctors.title: 中药专家
doctors.bio: 李医生专长于中药，已帮助数千名患者改善健康。
doctors.fullBio: 李医生是中药和整体健康领域的专家。她拥有中医药学博士学位，并发表了多篇关于草药疗法的研究论文。
